item.title: The Winter Olympics get 8 new events, including the first new sport in decades
item.description: Ski mountaineering will make its Olympic debut this year, the first winter sport to do so since 2002. Skeleton, luge, ski jumping and moguls are also getting new events.

item.title: Searching for dinosaur secrets in crocodile bones
item.description: Until now, estimating how old a dinosaur was when it died has been a fairly simple process: Count up the growth rings in the fossilized bones. But new research into some of dinosaurs' living relatives, like crocodiles, suggests that this method may not always work.
